resources.string: Looks like your goal list is not set up yet. \n Press button below to start creating new goals. \n Later here will be shown progress towards your goals.
Do you want to delete %1$s category? \nDeleting this category will also remove goals associated with it.
What have you done since last visit?
Click on textbox and type the event or the catrgory.
What have you done since the last visit?
Remember add your activity now for future refere
People keep journal have more knowledge about the past than others

string-array.name: moto
string-array.item: Being goal oriented is part of the success, journal helps to be in the line
Some times you need to change for betterment, but you need to know what is your life pattern today
What have you done since the last visit?
Remember add your activity now for the future reference
People that keep journal have more knowledge about the past than others
